cn.releaseNotes: 添加：第2章-插入排序和归并排序添加描述文档；
cn.description:
参照原书第三版，内容包括：
    第2章 算法入门：插入排序，归并排序；
    第4章 分治法：最大子集问题，矩阵相乘算法[常规算法，分治法，Strassen算法]；
    第6章 堆排序：堆排序[大根堆，小根堆]；
    第7章 快速排序：快速排序；
    第8章 线性时间排序：计数排序；
    第12章 二叉搜索树：二叉搜索树[中序遍历，递归搜索，迭代搜索，迭代最小，迭代最大，后继，先驱，插入，删除]；
    第13章 红黑树：红黑树[插入，删除]；
    第15章 动态规划：切钢条问题[递归，自顶向下，自底向上，打印]，最长公共子序列；
    第16章 贪心算法：活动选择问题[递归，迭代]，Huffman编码；
    第22章 基本图算法：广度优先搜索，深度优先搜索，拓扑排序，强连通分量；
    第23章 最小生成树：最小生成树[Kruskal算法，Prim算法];
    第24章 单源最短路径：Bellman-Ford算法，有向无环图算法，Dijkstra算法；
    第25章 每对顶点间的最短路径：最短路径算法[Slow算法，Faster算法，Floyd-Warshall算法]；
    第26章 最大流：Ford-Fulkerson算法；
    附加内容：Hanoi塔问题，N皇后问题，排序算法性能比较；

主要特点有：
    可单步或连续运行伪码，观察参数和数据结构的变化，有助于理解算法的设计思想；
    可设置程序断点，方便观察算法的断点状态，通过循环不变式验证其正确性；
    提供运行时函数栈，并标记函数返回位置，可轻松跟踪递归函数的运行过程，并有助于理解计算机程序的运行机制；
    记录代码行执行次数，有助于理解算法的时间复杂度；

希望此App能对您学习算法和数据结构有所帮助；

（重要！）本次更新后已完成所有苹果4G运存与6G运存手机的适配了，从iPhone11至17都能流畅游戏！
（感谢大家这两个月的等待与支持，我们会继续努力更新内容、做好进一步的效果与优化）

第十四部大型资料片“黑榜风云”第二弹重点内容
资料片特色内容1、全新资料片“黑榜风云”
1、天下英雄谱之“黑榜”（第一期）
“一卷《天下英雄谱》横空出世，列尽武林风流人物”，天下英雄谱之“黑榜”：朔海派教主“丁老怪”、黑沙寨寨主“崔振炀”、十二连环坞当家“鹰眼老七”等黑榜高手登场：
1)解锁跌宕起伏的黑榜风云剧情，获得独特产出！
2)大侠们将有机会与他们一同修炼专属武学，培养独属于你和黑榜人物的天赋、乃至神功秘籍、绝世神兵！
3)与江湖2原有的伙伴、结义、结缘、同门的玩法深度结合，更沉浸式的体验。
4)如同天下英雄谱之“百花谱”一样，我们将以“天下英雄”为核心，逐个资料片的塑造江湖中有血有肉的各类人物（参考古龙先生对角色的塑造）



2、黑榜枭雄并起，绿林豪杰争雄！全新黑榜风云剧情玩法
1)黑沙寨裂旗扬威，十二连环坞暗流绞杀，朔海派炼狱重开！三派枭雄竞逐黑榜魁首，胜者掌生杀大权，败者尸骨无存！新增相关门派全新黑榜剧情及挑战
2)天下三大镖局风云骤起，深陷黑榜漩涡！新增三大镖局黑榜相关恩怨情仇（隐藏剧情，还请大侠自行探索）


资料片特色内容2、新武学、新特效
1)武学新增：十二卷天魔策及其对应大型奇遇探险
2)武学特效：十二卷天魔策全套特效


资料片特色内容3、全新关系与经历玩法
全新关系与经历，根据主角与NPC关系动态生成交互事件和玩法（逐步更新）：
1)主角与NPC情分值达到一定程度会触发隐藏剧情
2)主角受伤严重时会有好友前来相助
3)特殊NPC在队伍或门派中有不同的羁绊效果


资料片特色内容4、全新传闻玩法
更具有江湖味，动态传闻事件与大世界生态、时辰、诸多玩法紧密结合，更多稀有奖励与全局成就！（逐步更新）

由于我们是首次尝试暗黑打宝模式，我们会根据大家的反馈持续优化刷宝体验。衷心感谢大家这些天在社区和官微群提出的宝贵体验反馈！

cn.description:
【核心特色：这就是你从未体验过的江湖】

1.  “移动端发货”：独属于你的无缝武侠大世界，真实武林画卷
       无读条世界：告别加载画面！我们打造了一个面积达256丈的无缝大世界——中原、江南、西域、南疆……从熙熙攘攘的古城街区，到人迹罕至的雪山秘境，所有场景皆可自由探索。
       活的江湖：昼夜、真实天气、万物动态（可破坏环境、可拾取万物）。世界不仅仅是背景，更是可交互的阶段。
       无束缚体验：轻功飞跃山河，踏波而行，攀爬峭壁。你的武侠梦，不再受束缚。

（我们的核心是创造一个‘无界’的武侠世界。在这里，地图没有空气墙，探索没有读条，整个世界是连贯、可交互、充满生机的）

2.  “第一代最受欢迎的玩法”：千种武学心法，自由搭配的武侠战斗
       没有僵化的“职业”限制！我们提供了超过数百种内功、外功、轻功、技艺。你可以是刀剑双绝的豪侠，也可以是精通音律、以琴音伤人的雅士，甚至是暗器毒术无双的“邪派”高手。
       武学招式不再是一成不变的关键循环。采用我们“无规则”战斗系统，所有的招式心苦自由搭配、组合，你自己的套路。是追求一击必杀的极限爆发，还是决定组建全场连绵不绝的控制？战斗的策略与乐趣，完全交由你。

3.  “你的江湖”：高自由度的人生，你的选择就是规则
       江湖不是非黑即白。你的每一个抉择都会引发难以想象的“因果链”。救下一个路人，他可能就是你未来宗门的引荐人；偷听一桩秘密，或许会让你卷入颠覆王朝的阴谋。
       可以选择拜入名门正派的恪守门规，也可以加入诡谲魔教随心所欲，更可以做个散人，逍遥自在。甚至可以完全抛开打杀，成为一名富甲天下的商贾、巧夺天工的匠人，也可以悬壶济世的神医。这个世界，认可你的每一种活法。

4.  “多达700万字的文本内容，庞大的玩法量级”：沙盒奇遇，要素隐藏线索
       《下一站江湖Ⅱ》的世界是“活”的。NPC们有自己的生活记录和喜怒哀乐。你可能在悬崖下发现前辈遗骸，学到失传绝学；也可能一碗酒，结交到一位隐世高人。
       大量未在任务列表中标记的“奇遇”事件散落在世界各个角落。探索的回报远超你的想象，真正的宝藏，永远献给最好奇的旅人。

5.  “市井百业，多维度沉浸身份”：技艺百态，感受江湖的烟火气
       江湖不止有武功。我们深入嵌入了当今同类生活技能：采矿、采药、锻造、制琴、象棋、书法、绘画、厨艺……这些不仅仅是赚钱的手段，更是提升角色、解锁特殊剧情和关卡能力的关键。一门技艺的技能，也能让你名动江湖。

【故事背景：游戏基础框架】（持续更新）
700万文字庞大世界观：战国末期，三国、百家、江湖！

1.  角色扮演：
① 多出身多结局，每个主角都是全新体验（当前已将门之子、富家千金、寒门书生、江湖浪子、无名小卒等五大身出300多万字主线剧情接近20个结局）

2.  市井身份：
① 皈依各器皿特色的城井身份独特的对应独立剧情、规则玩法。比如刺客对应青衣楼的门玩法派、以及相关的物品万字独立剧情，突出的悬赏及刺杀玩法等

3.  江湖霸图：模拟经营、骑砍LIKE、世界建造
① 物品可加入各具特色的门派
② 每个派都有自己的独立剧情以及与其他门派的恩怨，比如狂刀门和绝剑门的火烧凌云窟大型剧情
③ 每个门派都有自己突出的突出体系，以及规则：比如少林的从扫地僧至罗汉堂首座，敲钟玩法及铜人阵
④ 每个门派都强调自己的武学、心法体系
⑤ 每个门派都可以模拟经营、占领大世界的比如矿山青楼，并开启对应的经营
⑥ 每个门派都一样骑马与砍杀一样的世界争霸

4.  自由成长：习百家武学，走你自己的江湖

Leave your laptop behind. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere.   

Jump Desktop is a powerful remote desktop application that lets you control your computer from your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch. Compatible with RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up.

Easy setup and reliable:
Jump Desktop is very easy to setup; anyone can do it! Just visit: https://jumpdesktop.com on your PC or Mac, click the ‘Automatic Setup’ link and follow step-by-step instructions. You’ll be up and running in no time.

Secure and built on open standards:
Jump Desktop is a RDP and VNC client. You don't need to download additional software if you already have RDP or VNC configured and know the address of your computer. Just enter your IP address or hostname to connect.

Powerful features:
* Works with almost any computer and operating system
* Supports a physical mouse! Exclusive feature on the App Store! Important limitation: Jump Desktop does not work with standard Bluetooth mice and requires a specific Bluetooth mouse that pairs with iOS 
* New Fluid Remote Desktop protocol supports high performance remote desktop 
* Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi/3G/LTE without worrying about your router settings. Setup as many computers as you like – there are no limits! 
* Built for iPad Pro, iPad, iPhone and iPod
* iPad Pro features: Full support for split-screen multitasking and Apple Pencil
* Protect your server settings using Touch ID
* Connection syncing via iCloud connection syncing
* Advanced Bluetooth keyboard: The best bluetooth keyboard support on the App Store. Shortcuts, function keys and arrow keys - everything works. Also includes macros for keys no available on bluetooth keyboards (i.e function keys)
* SSH tunneling with password and public key authentication supported

* Full mouse support via touch gestures: left, right and middle button clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement
* Multiple gesture support - includes the ability to draw or write using your finger
* Copy/paste: Transfer text to or from your computer using the pasteboard
* HDMI/VGA support: view your desktop on the big screen using a cable or AirPlay. Jump's video out mode will let you utilize the full resolution of your external display.
* Multi-core rendering engine makes Jump Desktop one of the fastest RDP and VNC engines on the planet
* Full support for Linea and Infinea barcode and MSR scanners. Includes support for E2E encryption.

IMPORTANT NOTICE: Audio streaming and remote printing are NOT supported when connecting to Mac OS X and PCs running Windows ‘Home’ edition. 

RDP features:
* Supports RD Gateway
* Supports custom resolutions. Set any resolution you want including Retina resolutions.
* Dynamic RDP resolution updates on Windows 8.1+
* Remote printing: Send print outs from your computer to your iPad/iPhone device (exclusive RDP print redirection feature on the App Store!)
* Drive redirection
* Audio streaming
* Console sessions
* International keyboard layouts
* Multiple monitor support on Windows 7+
* Multi-touch redirection support on Windows 8+

VNC features:
* Tested with Mac OS X, TightVNC, RealVNC, UltraVNC, Linux (Ubuntu Remote Desktop)
* Secure: Supports SSH tunneling as well as SSL encryption
* Black & white, gray scale, 8, 16 and 24-bit color to help optimize bandwidth
* Multiple monitor support
* Macs: Support locking the Mac's screen and syncing the pasteboard

hk.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

請參考在PalReader 網站上的使用錄像來深入了解此應用程序.
閱讀程序具有以下先進功能:

專為iPhone 而做的存儲優化, 存儲相同的圖書比其它程序節省超過30%的空間.
全屏幕閱讀支持. LoudReader 只在用戶需要時顯示控制對話框, 而其它iPhone 閱讀程序顯示控制始終佔用寶貴的屏幕.
支持任意方向閱讀. 程序自動調整圖書顯示方式.
使用HTML顯示圖書的多種字體與圖像, 優於其它程序的單一字體文本顯示方式.
頁內捲動控制幫助讀者在長頁面內快速移動到任意位置.
直觀調整字體大小,顏色以及背景.
手指雙擊擊即可使用的章節選擇, 字體大小控制.
歷史記憶功能幫助用戶快速到任意章節或前後章節
準確回到上次閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置)

操作簡介

每一章為一長頁, 用手指拖動卷滾或輕擊頁面上部1/4或下部1/4進行向上或向下翻頁.
雙擊頁面即可彈出控制面板. 閱讀器的操作由這一個彈出式控制面板控制, 簡單直觀方便易用.
如希望快速在頁面內移動, 可用控制面板小滾輪選擇頁面位置百分比.
輕擊綠色的箭頭控制章節導航的後退和前進.
退出閱讀器時程序會自動記住最後的閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置), 下次進入閱讀器時程序直接打開到此處.

《漢末霸業》要求系統版本為iOS 16以上，並使用iPhone 8或8 Plus、iPhone X及以上、iPad Air 2、iPad mini 4、iPad 2017或任意iPad Pro進行遊戲。

QQ群: 293787531   795489685

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

hk.description:
加入数百万玩家，开启这款怪物训练游戏的续集冒险之旅！
在《EvoCreo 2》中，进入充满神秘的怪物世界，捕捉、培养并进化超过300种怪物。体验一个开放世界的RPG，展开一场充满怪物战斗与冒险的游戏旅程。怪物的进化和捕捉是你在这个怪物游戏中的使命，而这片土地上神秘的怪物，等待着你的探索！

揭开迷人的冒险故事
作为一名新兵，在《EvoCreo 2》的角色扮演游戏（RPG）中，加入Shoru警察学院，解开怪物消失背后的谜团。这个怪物游戏不仅仅是捕捉怪物，背后还有更深的阴谋，考验你在怪物战斗中的策略能力。途中，你将完成50多个引人入胜的任务，帮助Shoru的市民，建立联盟并发现隐藏的宝藏。

捕捉与培养超过300只怪物
你喜欢怪物收集游戏吗？在这个开放世界RPG中，组建你的梦想队伍，捕捉、培养、进化各种怪物。游戏中包含了超过300种独特的怪物，每个怪物都有其独特的进化和颜色。体验多样化的怪物捕捉与培养，让你在回合制怪物战斗中制定策略，挑战自我，成为传奇怪物训练师！

探索充满怪物的冒险世界
在《EvoCreo 2》里，你可以享受超过30小时的离线与在线RPG玩法，探索这个充满怪物和隐藏秘密的开放世界。从茂密的森林到神秘的洞穴，再到繁华的城镇，Shoru大陆充满了待解的谜题。在冒险的过程中，挑战不同的怪物，完成任务，解锁隐藏的路径和传奇的宝藏。

掌握深度且策略性的战斗系统
准备好迎接训练师之间的激烈战斗了吗？在这个高度可定制化的RPG游戏中，你可以装备你的怪物，并解锁100多种独特特征来增强它们的能力。训练你的怪物，学习并掌握超过200种技能，随时根据战斗的需要调整技能。通过怪物战斗，管理元素弱点，运用策略技能，成为真正的怪物训练大师！

证明自己，成为终极怪物训练大师
挑战Shoru的最强怪物训练师，在这个付费RPG游戏中崭露头角！参加声名显赫的竞技场，只有最强的怪物训练师才能获得冠军称号。你能在怪物战斗中获得胜利，登上冠军宝座，成为最顶尖的怪物训练大师吗？

主要特点：
- 世界顶级付费角色扮演游戏的续集
- 捕捉、培养、进化超过300只怪物
- 没有怪物等级上限，充满挑战的游戏结局！
- 拓展的开放世界，30小时以上的离线与在线RPG玩法
- 引人入胜的回合制怪物战斗，深度策略元素
- 数百种技能和特征，自由定制你的怪物
- 超过50个充满冒险和奖励的任务
- 离线模式——无需互联网也能畅玩游戏
- 精美的像素艺术，回归经典怪物RPG风格

玩家为何喜爱《EvoCreo 2》：
《EvoCreo 2》是怪物训练游戏和怪物培养RPG的完美结合
物种收集、探索和战斗策略的完美融合
休闲和硬核玩家都能享受这款充满冒险和动作的怪物游戏
今天就加入我们的冒险，开始成为终极怪物训练大师的旅程吧！你能捕捉所有怪物，解开Creo的秘密吗？

hk.description:
經典的砍殺遊戲終於推出 iOS 版，Heart Machine這款曾獲獎的遊戲現在以最精良且優質的特殊版本登場。


► 在享有盛譽的獨立遊戲節（Independent Games Festival）中獲得觀眾人氣大獎以及最佳視覺美術獎。

► 在最佳視覺設計、最佳音效以及最佳原創遊戲類別中獲得超過 14 項提名。

► 9/10 Destructoid – 卓越表現的典範。儘管有缺失但仍瑕不掩瑜，且不至於對遊戲造成重大影響。

► 9.5/10 Game Informer – 配樂、美術以及打鬥場景值得您沉浸其中並深入探索。

► Eurogamer 推薦 – Heart Machine 開發的砍殺遊戲不僅充滿挑戰性，且非常細緻，畫面也十分漂亮。

► 9/10 GameSpot – 不僅僅是單純的畫面漂亮；《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》所呈現的視覺效果可以指引您，且讓您放鬆。在緊張刺激的打鬥場景中，壯觀美景能讓您稍喘口氣。 

► 8.5 Polygon – 無論是思考戰略的時刻或是驚險的動作場景，《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》取得了兩者之間的完美平衡。

► Darkstation 5 顆星–上帝視角的動作角色扮演遊戲《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》非常棒：漂亮、迷人的世界供探索、遊戲操作靈敏、悅耳的配樂，並且對玩家有信心，相信他們可以自己想出遊戲進行的方式。


黑暗且暴力的過往陰影籠罩著這片不羈之地，當中滿是寶藏與鮮血。這個世界的旅者是收藏家，專門收集遺忘的知識、失落的科技以及破碎的歷史。我們的旅者被一種無法滿足的疾病纏身，朝著時間埋葬之地深入挺進，希望能找到治癒重症的方法。

《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》是動作冒險角色扮演遊戲，使用經典的16-bit 模式，再加上現代化的遊戲機制與更大規模的設計。探索這個美麗且廣大的荒廢之地，當中危機四伏且暗藏著失落科技。


特色：

● 支援 iPad Pro 120 fps 的畫面幀率/支援 iPhone 與 iPad 60 fps的畫面幀率。
● 與 MFi 控制手把相容。
● 遊戲中心（Game Center）成就。
● 觸覺震動。
● 從每一位角色到細緻的背景元素，一切都是手繪動畫的心血傑作。
● 容易上手但難以駕馭；敵人又壞又多，處處危機讓您脆弱的身體不堪一擊，且盟友又寥寥可數。
● 升級武器、學習新技能、探索裝備，在這個黑暗且暗藏細節的世界中，穿越一條條的路徑支線，揭開秘密。
● 沉浸在由Disasterpeace 所作的美妙配樂中。
● 不僅有原始遊戲中的所有內容，再加上更多武器、敵人以及特殊版本的區域。

Leave your laptop behind. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere.   

Jump Desktop is a remote desktop application that lets you securely connect to any computer in the world. Compatible with both RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up. Jump Desktop also supports our own, high performance, next generation remote desktop protocol called Fluid Remote Desktop. 

Easy setup and reliable:
Jump Desktop is very easy to setup; anyone can do it! Just visit: https://jumpdesktop.com on your PC or Mac, click the ‘Automatic Setup’ link and follow step-by-step instructions. You’ll be up and running in no time. Also - not subscriptions!

Secure:
Jump encrypts the connection between computers to ensure privacy and security. Automatic connections are always encrypted by default. Supports NLA, TLS/SSL encryption for RDP. SSH Tunnelling and SSL/TLS encryption for VNC. Fluid Remote Desktop uses DTLS for secure connections.

Powerful features:
* Works with almost any computer and operating system.
* Supports physical mice! On iOS 13 and iPadOS, Jump Desktop supports the accessibility mouse with some limitations. Jump Desktop also supports special physical mice with no limitations. For more information visit https://jumpdesktop.com/mice. 
* Fluid Remote Desktop protocol supports high performance remote desktop and audio.
* Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi/3G/LTE without worrying about your router settings. Setup as many computers as you like – there are no limits! 
* Built for iPad Pro, iPad, iPhone and iPod
* iPad Pro features: Full support for split-screen multitasking and Apple Pencil. 
* Open multiple simultaneous connections
* Live connection previews
* Protect your server settings using Touch ID
* Connection syncing via iCloud connection syncing
* Advanced Bluetooth keyboard: The best bluetooth keyboard support on the App Store. Shortcuts, function keys and arrow keys - everything works. Also includes macros for keys no available on bluetooth keyboards (i.e function keys)
* SSH tunneling with password and public key authentication supported
* Supports large custom screen resolutions and VGA/HDMI out 
* Full mouse support via touch gestures: left, right and middle button clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement
* Multiple gesture support - includes the ability to draw or write using your finger
* Copy/paste: Transfer text to or from your computer using the pasteboard
* HDMI/VGA external monitor support: View your desktop on an external monitor using a cable or AirPlay. Jump Desktop will let you utilize you external display as a true monitor (not as a mirror like other apps on the store). 
* Multi-core rendering engine makes Jump Desktop one of the fastest RDP and VNC engines on the planet
* Full support for Linea and Infinea barcode and MSR scanners. Includes support for E2E encryption.

RDP features:
* Supports RD Gateway
* Supports custom resolutions. Set any resolution you want including Retina resolutions.
* Dynamic RDP resolution updates on Windows 8.1+
* Remote printing: Send print outs from your computer to your iPad/iPhone device (exclusive RDP print redirection feature on the App Store!)
* Folder sharing
* Audio streaming
* Console sessions
* International keyboard layouts

mo.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

mo.description:
加入数百万玩家，开启这款怪物训练游戏的续集冒险之旅！
在《EvoCreo 2》中，进入充满神秘的怪物世界，捕捉、培养并进化超过300种怪物。体验一个开放世界的RPG，展开一场充满怪物战斗与冒险的游戏旅程。怪物的进化和捕捉是你在这个怪物游戏中的使命，而这片土地上神秘的怪物，等待着你的探索！

揭开迷人的冒险故事
作为一名新兵，在《EvoCreo 2》的角色扮演游戏（RPG）中，加入Shoru警察学院，解开怪物消失背后的谜团。这个怪物游戏不仅仅是捕捉怪物，背后还有更深的阴谋，考验你在怪物战斗中的策略能力。途中，你将完成50多个引人入胜的任务，帮助Shoru的市民，建立联盟并发现隐藏的宝藏。

捕捉与培养超过300只怪物
你喜欢怪物收集游戏吗？在这个开放世界RPG中，组建你的梦想队伍，捕捉、培养、进化各种怪物。游戏中包含了超过300种独特的怪物，每个怪物都有其独特的进化和颜色。体验多样化的怪物捕捉与培养，让你在回合制怪物战斗中制定策略，挑战自我，成为传奇怪物训练师！

探索充满怪物的冒险世界
在《EvoCreo 2》里，你可以享受超过30小时的离线与在线RPG玩法，探索这个充满怪物和隐藏秘密的开放世界。从茂密的森林到神秘的洞穴，再到繁华的城镇，Shoru大陆充满了待解的谜题。在冒险的过程中，挑战不同的怪物，完成任务，解锁隐藏的路径和传奇的宝藏。

掌握深度且策略性的战斗系统
准备好迎接训练师之间的激烈战斗了吗？在这个高度可定制化的RPG游戏中，你可以装备你的怪物，并解锁100多种独特特征来增强它们的能力。训练你的怪物，学习并掌握超过200种技能，随时根据战斗的需要调整技能。通过怪物战斗，管理元素弱点，运用策略技能，成为真正的怪物训练大师！

证明自己，成为终极怪物训练大师
挑战Shoru的最强怪物训练师，在这个付费RPG游戏中崭露头角！参加声名显赫的竞技场，只有最强的怪物训练师才能获得冠军称号。你能在怪物战斗中获得胜利，登上冠军宝座，成为最顶尖的怪物训练大师吗？

主要特点：
- 世界顶级付费角色扮演游戏的续集
- 捕捉、培养、进化超过300只怪物
- 没有怪物等级上限，充满挑战的游戏结局！
- 拓展的开放世界，30小时以上的离线与在线RPG玩法
- 引人入胜的回合制怪物战斗，深度策略元素
- 数百种技能和特征，自由定制你的怪物
- 超过50个充满冒险和奖励的任务
- 离线模式——无需互联网也能畅玩游戏
- 精美的像素艺术，回归经典怪物RPG风格

玩家为何喜爱《EvoCreo 2》：
《EvoCreo 2》是怪物训练游戏和怪物培养RPG的完美结合
物种收集、探索和战斗策略的完美融合
休闲和硬核玩家都能享受这款充满冒险和动作的怪物游戏
今天就加入我们的冒险，开始成为终极怪物训练大师的旅程吧！你能捕捉所有怪物，解开Creo的秘密吗？

mo.description:
經典的砍殺遊戲終於推出 iOS 版，Heart Machine這款曾獲獎的遊戲現在以最精良且優質的特殊版本登場。


► 在享有盛譽的獨立遊戲節（Independent Games Festival）中獲得觀眾人氣大獎以及最佳視覺美術獎。

► 在最佳視覺設計、最佳音效以及最佳原創遊戲類別中獲得超過 14 項提名。

► 9/10 Destructoid – 卓越表現的典範。儘管有缺失但仍瑕不掩瑜，且不至於對遊戲造成重大影響。

► 9.5/10 Game Informer – 配樂、美術以及打鬥場景值得您沉浸其中並深入探索。

► Eurogamer 推薦 – Heart Machine 開發的砍殺遊戲不僅充滿挑戰性，且非常細緻，畫面也十分漂亮。

► 9/10 GameSpot – 不僅僅是單純的畫面漂亮；《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》所呈現的視覺效果可以指引您，且讓您放鬆。在緊張刺激的打鬥場景中，壯觀美景能讓您稍喘口氣。 

► 8.5 Polygon – 無論是思考戰略的時刻或是驚險的動作場景，《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》取得了兩者之間的完美平衡。

► Darkstation 5 顆星–上帝視角的動作角色扮演遊戲《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》非常棒：漂亮、迷人的世界供探索、遊戲操作靈敏、悅耳的配樂，並且對玩家有信心，相信他們可以自己想出遊戲進行的方式。


黑暗且暴力的過往陰影籠罩著這片不羈之地，當中滿是寶藏與鮮血。這個世界的旅者是收藏家，專門收集遺忘的知識、失落的科技以及破碎的歷史。我們的旅者被一種無法滿足的疾病纏身，朝著時間埋葬之地深入挺進，希望能找到治癒重症的方法。

《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》是動作冒險角色扮演遊戲，使用經典的16-bit 模式，再加上現代化的遊戲機制與更大規模的設計。探索這個美麗且廣大的荒廢之地，當中危機四伏且暗藏著失落科技。


特色：

● 支援 iPad Pro 120 fps 的畫面幀率/支援 iPhone 與 iPad 60 fps的畫面幀率。
● 與 MFi 控制手把相容。
● 遊戲中心（Game Center）成就。
● 觸覺震動。
● 從每一位角色到細緻的背景元素，一切都是手繪動畫的心血傑作。
● 容易上手但難以駕馭；敵人又壞又多，處處危機讓您脆弱的身體不堪一擊，且盟友又寥寥可數。
● 升級武器、學習新技能、探索裝備，在這個黑暗且暗藏細節的世界中，穿越一條條的路徑支線，揭開秘密。
● 沉浸在由Disasterpeace 所作的美妙配樂中。
● 不僅有原始遊戲中的所有內容，再加上更多武器、敵人以及特殊版本的區域。

Leave your laptop behind. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere.   

Jump Desktop is a remote desktop application that lets you securely connect to any computer in the world. Compatible with both RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up. Jump Desktop also supports our own, high performance, next generation remote desktop protocol called Fluid Remote Desktop. 

Easy setup and reliable:
Jump Desktop is very easy to setup; anyone can do it! Just visit: https://jumpdesktop.com on your PC or Mac, click the ‘Automatic Setup’ link and follow step-by-step instructions. You’ll be up and running in no time. Also - not subscriptions!

Secure:
Jump encrypts the connection between computers to ensure privacy and security. Automatic connections are always encrypted by default. Supports NLA, TLS/SSL encryption for RDP. SSH Tunnelling and SSL/TLS encryption for VNC. Fluid Remote Desktop uses DTLS for secure connections.

Powerful features:
* Works with almost any computer and operating system.
* Supports physical mice! On iOS 13 and iPadOS, Jump Desktop supports the accessibility mouse with some limitations. Jump Desktop also supports special physical mice with no limitations. For more information visit https://jumpdesktop.com/mice. 
* Fluid Remote Desktop protocol supports high performance remote desktop and audio.
* Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi/3G/LTE without worrying about your router settings. Setup as many computers as you like – there are no limits! 
* Built for iPad Pro, iPad, iPhone and iPod
* iPad Pro features: Full support for split-screen multitasking and Apple Pencil. 
* Open multiple simultaneous connections
* Live connection previews
* Protect your server settings using Touch ID
* Connection syncing via iCloud connection syncing
* Advanced Bluetooth keyboard: The best bluetooth keyboard support on the App Store. Shortcuts, function keys and arrow keys - everything works. Also includes macros for keys no available on bluetooth keyboards (i.e function keys)
* SSH tunneling with password and public key authentication supported
* Supports large custom screen resolutions and VGA/HDMI out 
* Full mouse support via touch gestures: left, right and middle button clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement
* Multiple gesture support - includes the ability to draw or write using your finger
* Copy/paste: Transfer text to or from your computer using the pasteboard
* HDMI/VGA external monitor support: View your desktop on an external monitor using a cable or AirPlay. Jump Desktop will let you utilize you external display as a true monitor (not as a mirror like other apps on the store). 
* Multi-core rendering engine makes Jump Desktop one of the fastest RDP and VNC engines on the planet
* Full support for Linea and Infinea barcode and MSR scanners. Includes support for E2E encryption.

RDP features:
* Supports RD Gateway
* Supports custom resolutions. Set any resolution you want including Retina resolutions.
* Dynamic RDP resolution updates on Windows 8.1+
* Remote printing: Send print outs from your computer to your iPad/iPhone device (exclusive RDP print redirection feature on the App Store!)
* Folder sharing
* Audio streaming
* Console sessions
* International keyboard layouts
* Multiple monitor support on Windows 7+
* Multi-touch redirection support on Windows 8+

Fluid Features:
* Super high performance, adaptive remote desktop
* Audio streaming 
* Strong encryption built into the protocol
* Connect from anywhere, even restricted networks without requiring networking knowledge
* Clipboard sharing

VNC features:
* Tested with Mac OS X, TightVNC, RealVNC, UltraVNC, Linux (Ubuntu Remote Desktop)
* Secure: Supports SSH tunneling as well as SSL encryption
* Black & white, gray scale, 8, 16 and 24-bit color to help optimize bandwidth
* Multiple monitor support
* Macs: Support locking the Mac's screen and syncing the pasteboard

tw.description:
加入数百万玩家，开启这款怪物训练游戏的续集冒险之旅！
在《EvoCreo 2》中，进入充满神秘的怪物世界，捕捉、培养并进化超过300种怪物。体验一个开放世界的RPG，展开一场充满怪物战斗与冒险的游戏旅程。怪物的进化和捕捉是你在这个怪物游戏中的使命，而这片土地上神秘的怪物，等待着你的探索！

揭开迷人的冒险故事
作为一名新兵，在《EvoCreo 2》的角色扮演游戏（RPG）中，加入Shoru警察学院，解开怪物消失背后的谜团。这个怪物游戏不仅仅是捕捉怪物，背后还有更深的阴谋，考验你在怪物战斗中的策略能力。途中，你将完成50多个引人入胜的任务，帮助Shoru的市民，建立联盟并发现隐藏的宝藏。

捕捉与培养超过300只怪物
你喜欢怪物收集游戏吗？在这个开放世界RPG中，组建你的梦想队伍，捕捉、培养、进化各种怪物。游戏中包含了超过300种独特的怪物，每个怪物都有其独特的进化和颜色。体验多样化的怪物捕捉与培养，让你在回合制怪物战斗中制定策略，挑战自我，成为传奇怪物训练师！

探索充满怪物的冒险世界
在《EvoCreo 2》里，你可以享受超过30小时的离线与在线RPG玩法，探索这个充满怪物和隐藏秘密的开放世界。从茂密的森林到神秘的洞穴，再到繁华的城镇，Shoru大陆充满了待解的谜题。在冒险的过程中，挑战不同的怪物，完成任务，解锁隐藏的路径和传奇的宝藏。

掌握深度且策略性的战斗系统
准备好迎接训练师之间的激烈战斗了吗？在这个高度可定制化的RPG游戏中，你可以装备你的怪物，并解锁100多种独特特征来增强它们的能力。训练你的怪物，学习并掌握超过200种技能，随时根据战斗的需要调整技能。通过怪物战斗，管理元素弱点，运用策略技能，成为真正的怪物训练大师！

证明自己，成为终极怪物训练大师
挑战Shoru的最强怪物训练师，在这个付费RPG游戏中崭露头角！参加声名显赫的竞技场，只有最强的怪物训练师才能获得冠军称号。你能在怪物战斗中获得胜利，登上冠军宝座，成为最顶尖的怪物训练大师吗？

主要特点：
- 世界顶级付费角色扮演游戏的续集
- 捕捉、培养、进化超过300只怪物
- 没有怪物等级上限，充满挑战的游戏结局！
- 拓展的开放世界，30小时以上的离线与在线RPG玩法
- 引人入胜的回合制怪物战斗，深度策略元素
- 数百种技能和特征，自由定制你的怪物
- 超过50个充满冒险和奖励的任务
- 离线模式——无需互联网也能畅玩游戏
- 精美的像素艺术，回归经典怪物RPG风格

玩家为何喜爱《EvoCreo 2》：
《EvoCreo 2》是怪物训练游戏和怪物培养RPG的完美结合
物种收集、探索和战斗策略的完美融合
休闲和硬核玩家都能享受这款充满冒险和动作的怪物游戏
今天就加入我们的冒险，开始成为终极怪物训练大师的旅程吧！你能捕捉所有怪物，解开Creo的秘密吗？

tw.description:
經典的砍殺遊戲終於推出 iOS 版，Heart Machine這款曾獲獎的遊戲現在以最精良且優質的特殊版本登場。


► 在享有盛譽的獨立遊戲節（Independent Games Festival）中獲得觀眾人氣大獎以及最佳視覺美術獎。

► 在最佳視覺設計、最佳音效以及最佳原創遊戲類別中獲得超過 14 項提名。

► 9/10 Destructoid – 卓越表現的典範。儘管有缺失但仍瑕不掩瑜，且不至於對遊戲造成重大影響。

► 9.5/10 Game Informer – 配樂、美術以及打鬥場景值得您沉浸其中並深入探索。

► Eurogamer 推薦 – Heart Machine 開發的砍殺遊戲不僅充滿挑戰性，且非常細緻，畫面也十分漂亮。

► 9/10 GameSpot – 不僅僅是單純的畫面漂亮；《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》所呈現的視覺效果可以指引您，且讓您放鬆。在緊張刺激的打鬥場景中，壯觀美景能讓您稍喘口氣。 

► 8.5 Polygon – 無論是思考戰略的時刻或是驚險的動作場景，《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》取得了兩者之間的完美平衡。

► Darkstation 5 顆星–上帝視角的動作角色扮演遊戲《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》非常棒：漂亮、迷人的世界供探索、遊戲操作靈敏、悅耳的配樂，並且對玩家有信心，相信他們可以自己想出遊戲進行的方式。


黑暗且暴力的過往陰影籠罩著這片不羈之地，當中滿是寶藏與鮮血。這個世界的旅者是收藏家，專門收集遺忘的知識、失落的科技以及破碎的歷史。我們的旅者被一種無法滿足的疾病纏身，朝著時間埋葬之地深入挺進，希望能找到治癒重症的方法。

《光明旅者Hyper Light Drifter》是動作冒險角色扮演遊戲，使用經典的16-bit 模式，再加上現代化的遊戲機制與更大規模的設計。探索這個美麗且廣大的荒廢之地，當中危機四伏且暗藏著失落科技。


特色：

● 支援 iPad Pro 120 fps 的畫面幀率/支援 iPhone 與 iPad 60 fps的畫面幀率。
● 與 MFi 控制手把相容。
● 遊戲中心（Game Center）成就。
● 觸覺震動。
● 從每一位角色到細緻的背景元素，一切都是手繪動畫的心血傑作。
● 容易上手但難以駕馭；敵人又壞又多，處處危機讓您脆弱的身體不堪一擊，且盟友又寥寥可數。
● 升級武器、學習新技能、探索裝備，在這個黑暗且暗藏細節的世界中，穿越一條條的路徑支線，揭開秘密。
● 沉浸在由Disasterpeace 所作的美妙配樂中。
● 不僅有原始遊戲中的所有內容，再加上更多武器、敵人以及特殊版本的區域。

Leave your laptop behind. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere.   

Jump Desktop is a remote desktop application that lets you securely connect to any computer in the world. Compatible with both RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up. Jump Desktop also supports our own, high performance, next generation remote desktop protocol called Fluid Remote Desktop. 

Easy setup and reliable:
Jump Desktop is very easy to setup; anyone can do it! Just visit: https://jumpdesktop.com on your PC or Mac, click the ‘Automatic Setup’ link and follow step-by-step instructions. You’ll be up and running in no time. Also - not subscriptions!

Secure:
Jump encrypts the connection between computers to ensure privacy and security. Automatic connections are always encrypted by default. Supports NLA, TLS/SSL encryption for RDP. SSH Tunnelling and SSL/TLS encryption for VNC. Fluid Remote Desktop uses DTLS for secure connections.

Powerful features:
* Works with almost any computer and operating system.
* Supports physical mice! On iOS 13 and iPadOS, Jump Desktop supports the accessibility mouse with some limitations. Jump Desktop also supports special physical mice with no limitations. For more information visit https://jumpdesktop.com/mice. 
* Fluid Remote Desktop protocol supports high performance remote desktop and audio.
* Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi/3G/LTE without worrying about your router settings. Setup as many computers as you like – there are no limits! 
* Built for iPad Pro, iPad, iPhone and iPod
* iPad Pro features: Full support for split-screen multitasking and Apple Pencil. 
* Open multiple simultaneous connections
* Live connection previews
* Protect your server settings using Touch ID
* Connection syncing via iCloud connection syncing
* Advanced Bluetooth keyboard: The best bluetooth keyboard support on the App Store. Shortcuts, function keys and arrow keys - everything works. Also includes macros for keys no available on bluetooth keyboards (i.e function keys)
* SSH tunneling with password and public key authentication supported
* Supports large custom screen resolutions and VGA/HDMI out 
* Full mouse support via touch gestures: left, right and middle button clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement
* Multiple gesture support - includes the ability to draw or write using your finger
* Copy/paste: Transfer text to or from your computer using the pasteboard
* HDMI/VGA external monitor support: View your desktop on an external monitor using a cable or AirPlay. Jump Desktop will let you utilize you external display as a true monitor (not as a mirror like other apps on the store). 
* Multi-core rendering engine makes Jump Desktop one of the fastest RDP and VNC engines on the planet
* Full support for Linea and Infinea barcode and MSR scanners. Includes support for E2E encryption.

RDP features:
* Supports RD Gateway
* Supports custom resolutions. Set any resolution you want including Retina resolutions.
* Dynamic RDP resolution updates on Windows 8.1+
* Remote printing: Send print outs from your computer to your iPad/iPhone device (exclusive RDP print redirection feature on the App Store!)
* Folder sharing
* Audio streaming
* Console sessions
* International keyboard layouts
* Multiple monitor support on Windows 7+
* Multi-touch redirection support on Windows 8+

Fluid Features:
* Super high performance, adaptive remote desktop
* Audio streaming 
* Strong encryption built into the protocol
* Connect from anywhere, even restricted networks without requiring networking knowledge
* Clipboard sharing

VNC features:
* Tested with Mac OS X, TightVNC, RealVNC, UltraVNC, Linux (Ubuntu Remote Desktop)
* Secure: Supports SSH tunneling as well as SSL encryption
* Black & white, gray scale, 8, 16 and 24-bit color to help optimize bandwidth
* Multiple monitor support
* Macs: Support locking the Mac's screen and syncing the pasteboard

us.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

us.description:
Join millions of players in this pocket monster game sequel
Embark on an epic adventure in EvoCreo 2, the ultimate monster-catching RPG set in the captivating world of Shoru. Immerse yourself in a land teeming with mythical creatures called Creo. For thousands of years, these collectible monsters have roamed the lands, their origins and evolution shrouded in mystery. Do you have what it takes to unravel the secrets of the Creo and become a legendary Evoking Master Trainer?

Uncover a Compelling Adventure Game
Begin your role playing game (RPG) journey as a new recruit in the Shoru Police Academy. Creo Monsters are disappearing, and it's your mission to uncover the truth behind these mysterious events. But there's more to the story than meets the eye in this monster game — dark plots are brewing, and your skills will be put to the test. Along the way, assist the citizens of Shoru by completing over 50 engaging missions, building alliances, and discovering hidden treasures.

Capture and Train Over 300 Monsters
Love monster-collecting games? Build your RPG dream team of Creo in this open-world role playing game. Hunt rare and legendary monsters, each available in unique alternate colors. With over 300 unique monsters to capture, evolve, and train, you’ll have endless possibilities to customize your strategy in pocket monster games. Create powerful combinations and lead your Creo to victory in thrilling turn-based battles.

Explore this monster adventure game
Experience more than 30 hours of offline and online rpg gameplay as you dive into a richly detailed open world. From dense forests to mysterious caves and bustling towns, the continent of Shoru is filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered. Adventure through diverse environments, complete challenging quests, and uncover hidden paths to legendary treasures. Explore 2 more biomes in this sequel like the desert and find many monsters on the way of your adventure. 

Master a deep and strategic RPG battle system as a monster trainer & hunter
Prepare for trainer battles with a highly customizable system. Equip your Creo with items and unlock over 100 unique traits to enhance their abilities. Train your Creo to learn and master over 200 moves, which you can swap anytime to adapt to new challenges. Face fierce opponents, manage elemental weaknesses, and use your tactical skills to gain the upper hand. Can you become a pocket monster master trainer?

Prove Yourself as the Ultimate Master Trainer
Challenge the strongest monster trainers across Shoru and rise through the ranks in this paid role playing game. Compete in the prestigious Coliseum, where only the best monster trainers are crowned as champions. Will you conquer every rpg battle and claim the title of Evoking Master Trainer?

Key Features:
- Sequel of one of the top paid role playing games worldwide
- 300+ collectible monsters to capture, train, and evolve.
- No level cap on your monsters - engaging endgame!
- A sprawling open world with 30+ hours of offline & online gameplay.
- Engaging turn-based battles with deep strategy elements.
- Hundreds of moves and traits to customize your Creo.
- Over 50 missions packed with adventure and rewards.
- Offline play—no internet required to enjoy the game.
- Stunning pixel art visuals reminiscent of classic monster RPGs.

Why Players Love EvoCreo 2:
Fans of Monster-Catching games and monster trainer RPGs will feel right at home.
A perfect mix of creature collection, exploration, and battle strategy.
Casual and hardcore gamers alike will enjoy the mix of action and adventure.

Join the adventure today and start your journey toward becoming the ultimate monster trainer in EvoCreo 2! Can you catch them all and master the secrets of the Creo?

us.description:
聖經(和合本)(繁體中英對照)
	Application contains traditional Chinese bible and English bible for reference reading.
	可自由選擇中英對照, 繁體中文或英文聖經閱讀.


請參考在PalReader 網站上的使用錄像來深入了解此應用程序.
閱讀程序具有以下先進功能:

專為iPhone 而做的存儲優化, 存儲相同的圖書比其它程序節省超過30%的空間.
全屏幕閱讀支持. LoudReader 只在用戶需要時顯示控制對話框, 而其它iPhone 閱讀程序顯示控制始終佔用寶貴的屏幕.
支持任意方向閱讀. 程序自動調整圖書顯示方式.
使用HTML顯示圖書的多種字體與圖像, 優於其它程序的單一字體文本顯示方式.
頁內捲動控制幫助讀者在長頁面內快速移動到任意位置.
直觀調整字體大小,顏色以及背景.
手指雙擊擊即可使用的章節選擇, 字體大小控制.
歷史記憶功能幫助用戶快速到任意章節或前後章節
準確回到上次閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置)

操作簡介

每一章為一長頁, 用手指拖動卷滾或輕擊頁面上部1/4或下部1/4進行向上或向下翻頁.
雙擊頁面即可彈出控制面板. 閱讀器的操作由這一個彈出式控制面板控制, 簡單直觀方便易用.
如希望快速在頁面內移動, 可用控制面板小滾輪選擇頁面位置百分比.
輕擊綠色的箭頭控制章節導航的後退和前進.
退出閱讀器時程序會自動記住最後的閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置), 下次進入閱讀器時程序直接打開到此處.

us.description:
Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition.


► Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival.

► 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories.

► 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage.

► 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration.

► Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful.

► 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences.

tr.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

tr.description:
Join millions of players in this pocket monster game sequel
Embark on an epic adventure in EvoCreo 2, the ultimate monster-catching RPG set in the captivating world of Shoru. Immerse yourself in a land teeming with mythical creatures called Creo. For thousands of years, these collectible monsters have roamed the lands, their origins and evolution shrouded in mystery. Do you have what it takes to unravel the secrets of the Creo and become a legendary Evoking Master Trainer?

Uncover a Compelling Adventure Game
Begin your role playing game (RPG) journey as a new recruit in the Shoru Police Academy. Creo Monsters are disappearing, and it's your mission to uncover the truth behind these mysterious events. But there's more to the story than meets the eye in this monster game — dark plots are brewing, and your skills will be put to the test. Along the way, assist the citizens of Shoru by completing over 50 engaging missions, building alliances, and discovering hidden treasures.

Capture and Train Over 300 Monsters
Love monster-collecting games? Build your RPG dream team of Creo in this open-world role playing game. Hunt rare and legendary monsters, each available in unique alternate colors. With over 300 unique monsters to capture, evolve, and train, you’ll have endless possibilities to customize your strategy in pocket monster games. Create powerful combinations and lead your Creo to victory in thrilling turn-based battles.

Explore this monster adventure game
Experience more than 30 hours of offline and online rpg gameplay as you dive into a richly detailed open world. From dense forests to mysterious caves and bustling towns, the continent of Shoru is filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered. Adventure through diverse environments, complete challenging quests, and uncover hidden paths to legendary treasures. Explore 2 more biomes in this sequel like the desert and find many monsters on the way of your adventure. 

Master a deep and strategic RPG battle system as a monster trainer & hunter
Prepare for trainer battles with a highly customizable system. Equip your Creo with items and unlock over 100 unique traits to enhance their abilities. Train your Creo to learn and master over 200 moves, which you can swap anytime to adapt to new challenges. Face fierce opponents, manage elemental weaknesses, and use your tactical skills to gain the upper hand. Can you become a pocket monster master trainer?

Prove Yourself as the Ultimate Master Trainer
Challenge the strongest monster trainers across Shoru and rise through the ranks in this paid role playing game. Compete in the prestigious Coliseum, where only the best monster trainers are crowned as champions. Will you conquer every rpg battle and claim the title of Evoking Master Trainer?

Key Features:
- Sequel of one of the top paid role playing games worldwide
- 300+ collectible monsters to capture, train, and evolve.
- No level cap on your monsters - engaging endgame!
- A sprawling open world with 30+ hours of offline & online gameplay.
- Engaging turn-based battles with deep strategy elements.
- Hundreds of moves and traits to customize your Creo.
- Over 50 missions packed with adventure and rewards.
- Offline play—no internet required to enjoy the game.
- Stunning pixel art visuals reminiscent of classic monster RPGs.

Why Players Love EvoCreo 2:
Fans of Monster games and monster trainer RPGs will feel right at home.
A perfect mix of creature collection, exploration, and battle strategy.
Casual and hardcore gamers alike will enjoy the mix of action and adventure.

Join the adventure today and start your journey toward becoming the ultimate monster trainer in EvoCreo 2! Can you catch them all and master the secrets of the Creo?

pt.description:
Já imaginou como é estar na linha da frente da segurança nacional?

Em Black Border 2, você assume o papel de um agente da Polícia de Fronteira, enfrentando situações desafiantes a cada turno. Com visuais detalhados e jogabilidade envolvente, este jogo oferece uma experiência realista incomparável que coloca você no centro da ação.

Assuma a responsabilidade de proteger as fronteiras do seu país contra o contrabando ilegal. Inspecione veículos, reveja documentos e enfrente contrabandistas que tentam traficar drogas, armas e outras mercadorias ilegais.

Cada dia traz novos desafios, onde pensamento rápido e visão aguçada são as suas melhores ferramentas. Você é mais do que um simples agente de fronteira — você é a última linha de defesa.

Funcionalidades de Black Border 2:

    Simulação autêntica de patrulha de fronteira: Coloque-se no papel de um verdadeiro agente, onde cada decisão conta e cada interação está carregada de tensão.

    Inspeção detalhada de documentos: Analise cuidadosamente passaportes, autorizações e outros documentos para decidir quem pode entrar e quem deve ser barrado.

    Deteção de contrabando: Realize buscas minuciosas em veículos e inspeções pessoais para capturar criminosos que tentam contrabandear mercadorias ilegais.

    Personagens dinâmicos com IA: Interaja com personagens realistas que reagem e se adaptam com base nas suas decisões e ações.

    Desafios crescentes: Desde pequenos erros em documentos até grandes redes de contrabando, enfrente missões cada vez mais intensas que vão testar os seus limites.

Junta-te a milhões de jogadores na sequência do jogo de monstros Pocket Monster.
Embarca numa aventura épica em EvoCreo 2, o RPG de captura de monstros no mundo de Shoru. Descobre criaturas míticas chamadas Creo, que vagam pela terra com origens e evolução misteriosas. Tens o que é necessário para desvendar os segredos dos Creo e tornar-te um lendário Monster Hunter e Evoking Master Trainer?

Descobre um jogo de aventura envolvente
Inicia a tua jornada como recruta na Academia de Polícia de Shoru. Monstros Creo estão a desaparecer, e a tua missão é descobrir a verdade por trás destes eventos misteriosos. Mas há mais nesta história do que parece – intrigas sombrias estão a formar-se, e as tuas habilidades como Monster Hunter serão desafiadas. Ajuda os cidadãos de Shoru, completando mais de 50 missões, formando alianças e descobrindo tesouros escondidos.

Captura e treina mais de 300 monstros
Adoras jogos de Monster e captura de monstros? Cria a tua equipa de sonhos com Creo neste RPG de mundo aberto. Caça monstros raros e lendários, cada um disponível em cores alternativas exclusivas. Com mais de 300 monstros únicos para capturar, evoluir e treinar, terás várias possibilidades para personalizar a tua estratégia. Cria combinações poderosas e leva os teus Creo à vitória em emocionantes batalhas por turnos como um verdadeiro Monster Hunter.

Explora este jogo de aventura
Desfruta de mais de 30 horas de jogabilidade offline e online num mundo aberto ricamente detalhado. De florestas densas a cavernas misteriosas e cidades movimentadas, o continente de Shoru está cheio de segredos. Aventura-te por diferentes ambientes, completa missões desafiantes e descobre caminhos secretos para tesouros lendários. Explora 2 novos biomas nesta sequência de jogos de monstros, como a deslumbrante Wüste, e encontra muitos monstros na tua jornada.

Domina um sistema de combate profundo e estratégico
Prepara-te para batalhas de Monster Duel com um sistema personalizável. Equipa os teus monstros com itens e desbloqueia mais de 100 características únicas. Treina os teus monstros para aprender mais de 200 movimentos, que podes trocar a qualquer momento para te adaptaste aos novos desafios. Enfrenta oponentes ferozes, gere as fraquezas elementares e utiliza as tuas habilidades táticas em batalhas por turnos. Conseguirás tornar-te um mestre dos Pocket Monsters e capturá-los todos?

Prova-te como o/a Mestre Treinador/a definitivo/a
Desafia os treinadores mais fortes de Shoru e sobe nas classificações neste RPG pago. Luta no Coliseu, onde apenas os melhores Monster Hunter Trainers serão coroados campeões. Conquistarás todas as batalhas RPG e alcançarás o título de Evoking Master Trainer, tornando-te um dos melhores jogadores neste jogo de monstros?

Características principais:
- Continuação de um dos jogos pagos mais populares do mundo
- Mais de 300 monstros colecionáveis para capturar, treinar e evoluir
- Sem limite de nível para os seus monstros - final de jogo envolvente!
- Um vasto mundo aberto com mais de 30 horas de jogabilidade offline e online
- Batalhas por turnos emocionantes com elementos de estratégia de batalha profundos
- Centenas de movimentos e características para personalizar os teus Creo
- Mais de 50 missões cheias de aventura e recompensas
- Jogo offline – sem necessidade de internet para aproveitar o jogo
- Gráficos em pixel art, lembrando os clássicos RPGs de monstros

Por que os jogadores amam EvoCreo 2:
Fãs de jogos de Monstros vão se sentir em casa.

A mistura perfeita de coleção de monstros, exploração de mundo aberto e estratégia de batalha.
Jogadores casuais e hardcore vão adorar a combinação de ação e aventura neste RPG de monstros.

Junta-te à aventura hoje e começa a tua jornada para te tornares o mestre definitivo dos Monster Hunters em EvoCreo 2! Conseguirás capturá-los todos e dominar os segredos dos Creo? Um jogo fantástico de captura de monstros espera por ti!

pt.releaseNotes: Improved compatibility with 120 hz screen refresh rate on the new iPhone and iPad models.
pt.description:
Finalmente, o premiado slash-'em-up da Heart Machine chega ao iOS na sua versão mais polida e refinada de sempre, a Special Edition.


► Vencedor dos prémios "Audience Award" e "Excellence in Visual Art" do prestigiado Independent Games Festival.

► Mais de 14 nomeações nas categorias Melhor Design Visual, Melhor Áudio e Melhor Jogo Original.

► 9/10 Destructoid « Um exemplo de excelência. Podem existir falhas, mas são insignificantes e não causam granes estragos. »

► 9,5/10 Game Informer « A combinação da banda sonora, dos gráficos e dos combates cria um ambiente complexo que vale a pena explorar. »

► Recomendado pela Eurogamer « O slash-'em-up da Heart Machine é esgotante e preciso - e incrivelmente belo. »

► 9/10 GameSpot « É mais do que simplesmente bonito; o Hyper Light Drifter usa os seus gráficos para te guiar e relaxar. As paisagens magníficas desaceleram a pulsação entre sequências de combate difíceis, que te deixam sem fôlego. »

► 8,5 Polygon « O Hyper Light Drifter combina habilmente momentos contemplativos com ação vertiginosa. »

► 5 Estrelas Darkstation « O RPG de ação, visto de cima, Hyper Light Drifter é um jogo espantoso: lindo, um mundo fascinante para explorar, controlos sem falhas, música magnífica e a confiança no jogador que o fará descobrir as coisas sozinho. »


Os ecos de um passado sombrio e violento ressoam através das terras selvagens, repletas de tesouros e sangue. Os Drifters deste mundo são os colecionadores de conhecimentos esquecidos, tecnologias perdidas e histórias desfeitas. O nosso Drifter é assombrado por uma doença insaciável, viajando pelas terras do Tempo Sepultado, na esperança de descobrir uma forma de apaziguar a doença cruel.

Hyper Light Drifter é um RPG de ação/aventura ao estilo dos melhores clássicos de 16 bits, com mecânicas modernizadas e gráficos numa escala grandiosamente superior. Explora um vasto mundo deslumbrante e em ruínas, repleto de perigos e tecnologias esquecidas.


Características:

● Jogabilidade de 120 fps no iPad Pro / 60 fps no iPhone e iPad.
● Compatível com controladores MFi.
● Conquistas no Game Center.
● Vibração táctil.
● Desde as personagens aos elementos subtis do cenário, tudo foi concebido à mão com o maior dos afetos.
● Fácil de aprender, difícil de dominar; os inimigos são cruéis e numerosos, os perigos podem esmagar facilmente o teu corpo frágil e os rostos amigáveis são raros.
● Melhora as armas, aprende novas habilidades, descobre equipamentos e atravessa um mundo sombrio e detalhado onde abundam encruzilhadas e segredos.
● Banda sonora evocativa criada por Disasterpeace.
● Todo o conteúdo do jogo original + mais armas, inimigos e áreas da Special Edition.

Leave your laptop behind. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere.   

Jump Desktop is a remote desktop application that lets you securely connect to any computer in the world. Compatible with both RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up. Jump Desktop also supports our own, high performance, next generation remote desktop protocol called Fluid Remote Desktop. 

Easy setup and reliable:
Jump Desktop is very easy to setup; anyone can do it! Just visit: https://jumpdesktop.com on your PC or Mac, click the ‘Automatic Setup’ link and follow step-by-step instructions. You’ll be up and running in no time. Also - not subscriptions!

Secure:
Jump encrypts the connection between computers to ensure privacy and security. Automatic connections are always encrypted by default. Supports NLA, TLS/SSL encryption for RDP. SSH Tunnelling and SSL/TLS encryption for VNC. Fluid Remote Desktop uses DTLS for secure connections.

Powerful features:
* Works with almost any computer and operating system.
* Supports physical mice! On iOS 13 and iPadOS, Jump Desktop supports the accessibility mouse with some limitations. Jump Desktop also supports special physical mice with no limitations. For more information visit https://jumpdesktop.com/mice. 
* Fluid Remote Desktop protocol supports high performance remote desktop and audio.
* Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi/3G/LTE without worrying about your router settings. Setup as many computers as you like – there are no limits! 
* Built for iPad Pro, iPad, iPhone and iPod
* iPad Pro features: Full support for split-screen multitasking and Apple Pencil. 
* Open multiple simultaneous connections
* Live connection previews
* Protect your server settings using Touch ID
* Connection syncing via iCloud connection syncing
* Advanced Bluetooth keyboard: The best bluetooth keyboard support on the App Store. Shortcuts, function keys and arrow keys - everything works. Also includes macros for keys no available on bluetooth keyboards (i.e function keys)
* SSH tunneling with password and public key authentication supported
* Supports large custom screen resolutions and VGA/HDMI out 
* Full mouse support via touch gestures: left, right and middle button clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement
* Multiple gesture support - includes the ability to draw or write using your finger
* Copy/paste: Transfer text to or from your computer using the pasteboard
* HDMI/VGA external monitor support: View your desktop on an external monitor using a cable or AirPlay. Jump Desktop will let you utilize you external display as a true monitor (not as a mirror like other apps on the store). 
* Multi-core rendering engine makes Jump Desktop one of the fastest RDP and VNC engines on the planet
* Full support for Linea and Infinea barcode and MSR scanners. Includes support for E2E encryption.

RDP features:
* Supports RD Gateway
* Supports custom resolutions. Set any resolution you want including Retina resolutions.
* Dynamic RDP resolution updates on Windows 8.1+
* Remote printing: Send print outs from your computer to your iPad/iPhone device (exclusive RDP print redirection feature on the App Store!)
* Folder sharing
* Audio streaming
* Console sessions
* International keyboard layouts
* Multiple monitor support on Windows 7+
* Multi-touch redirection support on Windows 8+

Fluid Features:
* Super high performance, adaptive remote desktop
* Audio streaming 
* Strong encryption built into the protocol
* Connect from anywhere, even restricted networks without requiring networking knowledge
* Clipboard sharing

VNC features:
* Tested with Mac OS X, TightVNC, RealVNC, UltraVNC, Linux (Ubuntu Remote Desktop)
* Secure: Supports SSH tunneling as well as SSL encryption
* Black & white, gray scale, 8, 16 and 24-bit color to help optimize bandwidth
* Multiple monitor support
* Macs: Support locking the Mac's screen and syncing the pasteboard
